Room.Name: Gypsy Pawn Shop
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a darkened little pawn shop run by a family of gypsies.
Room.LongDescription: The gypsies are relatively quiet people, but need to make their money somehow. They offer to tell you your future for a share of your gold. Although most of the things they might tell you are the same thing you'd get out of a fortune cookie, your future might be in for a few surprises.
